pageContent: Purpose: To compare patient-reported disease-specific functional outcomes after external beam radiation therapy (EBRT) and EBRT combined with low-dose-rate brachytherapy prostate boost (EB-LDR) among men with localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
[Evaluation of sexual dysfunction in prostate cancer management]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20123518/
